alternativeNames: Yakuza Reincarnation - Yakuza Princess of Another World -
任侠転生-異世界のヤクザ姫-
Героизм перерождённого: Принцесса якудза в другом мире
author: Takeshi Natsuhara
description: An old school yakuza, Nagamasa Ryumatsu, ended up losing his life due to certain circumstances. But, when he awakened to a strange sort of scenery he had never seen before, he found that he had somehow changed into a beautiful girl?!
